name: Beam Me Up
description:
You are a robot alone in space. You don't know where you are. The only way is to move forward! You need to get to the blue portal(s) 3 times to move on, but the ground you touch dissappear, so you can never use the same route twice. 

The game was made at the Nordic Game Jam 2019. 

Made by:
Viktor Vase (programming)
Jonas Bentzen (art)
